title: A Quiet Evening
description: A short episodic story with nested sections, illustrating the JSON structure.

sections.name: Section 1.0: Arrival
content: The sun was setting as Mara approached the old inn.
A chill ran down her spine when she stepped inside.

subsections.name: Section 1.1: The Reception
content: The innkeeper looked up from his ledger, eyes narrowing.

subsections.name: Section 1.1.1: Observing the Room
content: Mara noticed the faint smell of burning wood and dust.
The room felt smaller than she remembered from the maps.

subsections.name: Section 1.2: Choosing a Room
content: Mara chose a room on the second floor, overlooking the courtyard.
The staircase creaked as she climbed, echoing in the empty inn.

sections.name: Section 2.0: Nightfall
content: By the time Mara finished unpacking, darkness had fallen completely.
The inn was quiet, save for the occasional sound of footsteps in the hall.

subsections.name: Section 2.1: A Strange Noise
content: A soft thumping came from somewhere above.
Mara paused, listening carefully, then continued with her tasks.

subsections.name: Section 2.2: Preparing for Tomorrow
content: She laid out her map and notes, planning her route for the next day.
Even with the strange noises, she felt a quiet determination.
